name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OxScrape | Scrape Reviews & questions Data to CSV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape and save item reviews and questions to a CSV file with one click. Export includes comments, ratings, images, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Features

- Extract reviews / questions from item page, including content, ratings, images, etc.
- Provide support for sorting.
- Support filtering of reviews type.
- Allow direct export of review listings to CSV files.

# How to use?

- Open the item detail page for which you need to export reviews / questions.
- Click on this Chrome extension app.
- Click the "Scrape and Export Reviews"  button located next to the review count to initiate the retrieval of reviews.
- Click the “Scrape and Export Questions”  button located next to the questions count to initiate the retrieval of questions.
- Allow the process to finish, and the data will be automatically downloaded in a CSV file.

# **Is it Free?**

Indeed, OxScrape is available for free. You can access the basic features and choose to upgrade for more functionalities.

# **Data Privacy**

All data processing occurs locally on your computer, and it never traverses our servers.

# **Disclaimer**

Ozon is a trademark owned by Ozon (Internet Solutions LLC). OxScrape has no affiliation, endorsement, sponsorship, or direct relation to Ozon (Internet Solutions LLC), its affiliates, or subsidiaries.
